name: Funky Club of 20 Grooves
description:
Hastily made in around 3 days, Funky Club of 20 Grooves is a fan-created Friday Night Funkin' clone set in the universe of A Hat in Time, revolving around DJ Grooves' nightclub! Currently, it features only 1 level, poorly drawn art and a music track thrown together in a few hours. Hope you enjoy!

Made for the STOP WAITING FOR GODOT jam.

(at some point this will probably become an actual project with a lot of effort put in)
